channel.title: Yui's personal task manager
channel.description: Recent content on Yui's personal task manager

item.title: Yui-cli 1.0.5 released
item.description: pip install yui --upgrade CHANGELOG [2023-02-20] Added MacOS and Windows changes for yui open error handling for random string instead of taskId yui open bug fixed for windows platform

item.title: Yui's GUI client 1.0.0-alpha released, dark theme support added
item.description: Light/Dark color scheme detected automatically. Actual look will depend on your system settings. Screenshot was made on KDE with Breeze Dark theme.

item.title: Download and Install
item.description: Installation Install Yui-CLI (command line) Install from python repository (see also pypi.org/project/yui/) pip install yui That’s it :) Install Yui-GUI alpha Download installer for windows 10: Yui-1.0.0-alpha-win10-x64-installer.exe (upd:2023-02-20) RPM for Fedora/CentOS/RedHat: coming soon DEB for Ubuntu/Debian: coming soon Please, submit any bugs found here: github.com/AgaveStorm/yui/issues Changelog [2023-02-20] Added Dark/Light theme support
